1.0.0.name: gelembjuk/locale
1.0.0.description: Internationalization support for PHP applications. It is a simple set of classes to manage languages/locales, to translate texts depending on a locale. The package contains a trait to include internationalization functions to any classes very easy and with minimum coding.

dev-master.name: gelembjuk/locale
dev-master.description: Internationalization support for PHP applications. It is a simple set of classes to manage languages/locales, to translate texts depending on a locale. The package contains a trait to include internationalization functions to any classes very easy and with minimum coding.
